course_description: This course is structured to help students become knowledgeable in dealing with the sexual issues of clients and other target populations. Adaptations necessary when life events threaten or interfere with sexual integrity and functioning will be covered.
sections: Class Nbr: 3230, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 3:30-7:20p, Instructor: M. Sariev, Status: Open
